name: Soccer 3D Game 2015
description:
Ultimate Soccer Challenge in awesome 3D for 2015.

Attention soccer players and fams! Test your football practice and shot techniques in the soon to be #1 Football game in 3D, a fun way to play World Soccer for the new year!
You start head to head, get ready to steal the ball. Just the game you were looking for in 2015. The better the player is, the longer they are able to play! Super fun sports Soccer simulator.
You need to score as many points as possible within the given time. Each half is only 90 seconds. Its difficult to win, so good luck! One of the Best Soccer Games you can play.
How to Play:
- Use the touchpad and buttons to kick and pass the ball down the field.
Game Features:
- Super Fun 3D graphics
- Great game sound effects
- Take the Corner kick and win!
